vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.21;
son of: Benjamin (H1144);
brother of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Ashbel (H0788), Gera (H1617), Naaman (H5283), Ehi (H0278), Rosh (H7220), Huppim (H2650H), Ard (H0714), Ahiram (H0297) and Jediael (H3043); also called Shephupham (KJV, NIV: Shupham) at Num.26.39; Shephuphan at 1Ch.8.5;
Group of mup.pim (מֻפִּים "Muppim" H4649)
§ Shuphamites = see Shupham "bareness"
Benjamites, the descendants of Shupham
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Sufam; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書反族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 書反 "貧瘠"
便雅憫人, 書反的後裔(民 26:39)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
书反族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 书反 "贫瘠"
便雅悯人, 书反的后裔(民 26:39)
